name: @shimaore/pgcouch
description: PostgreSQL with record semantics like CouchDB
author: St√©phane Alnet <stephane@shimaore.net>

scripts.build: tsc --strict --esModuleInterop --target ES2021 --moduleResolution Node index.ts && mv index.js index.mjs
scripts.pretest: tsc --strict --esModuleInterop --target ES2021 --moduleResolution Node test/test.ts && mv test/test.js test/test.mjs && esbuild --outfile=test/test.cjs test/test.mjs --format=cjs && sed -i -e "s|from '..'|from '../index.mjs'|" test/test.mjs
